name: Insanity's Grip
description:
What is reality and what is hallucination?... I can't say anymore.
Anthony Smith is looking for help with a broken-down car at a nearby hotel. In a twist of events, he wakes up to a reality in which he fights to free his mind and soul.

Find out what happened!

Relive the most important memories of your life. They hide a lot more than you think!

You're Not Alone!

Scary sounds, moving objects, or visions are not the only things stuck in your memories. Be careful!

Explore the Environment!

Explore abandoned rooms to find medkits and batteries. Trust me, you'll need them!
